content:
approved changes from today's CG WG call.

GF10378 remove hla-genotyping-resultsConsensusSequenceBlock from Diagnostic Report for HLA Genotyping Results because consensus-sequence-block profile was removed

GF10379 remove hla-genotyping-resultsAlleleAsignmentDate from Diagnostic Report Profile for HLA Genotyping Results. This element is redundant with other available elements in Diagnostic Report, e.g., DiagnosticReport.issued.
I'm not sure I can make these changes now since we're on a freeze already. @Grahame Grieve needs to approve them.
If we can't make these changes now, I suppose we can enter them in as ballot comments?
further discussion about whether these changes are allowed or not in the freeze on the committers stream
@ Bob Milius , all 3 gForge changes were approved by Grahame. Did the CGWG vote on these as well and they all passed so I have green light to commit to the codebase?
great! and yes, the CGWG voted to accept these changes today.
